events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
Assigning refund specialist Thomas J. to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I'm Thomas from customer support. I understand you'd like a refund and I'm here to help.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and process your refund?
I've attached the photos of the wrong product I got. This mistake has caused significant inconvenience.
Thanks for the photos. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should receive confirmation within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and for handling my refund so efficiently. I appreciate your help.
The refund process has been completed on our side. You will see the credited amount in your account shortly.
Checking in to confirm that you received the refund and if there is anything else I can assist you with today?
As you confirmed the refund has been received, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience!
